landing.title: AI Music Video Generator
landing.subtitle: Create professional music videos for Suno, Udio, and any AI-generated music. Perfect sync, stunning visuals, unlimited creativity.
landing.feature1.title: Lightning Fast
landing.feature1.desc: Generate a preview in minutes. No waiting, no complex setup.
landing.feature2.title: Perfect Sync
landing.feature2.desc: Our AI analyzes rhythm, energy, and structure to match visuals to your music.
landing.feature3.title: Smart Preview
landing.feature3.desc: We detect the hook and generate a short preview to spark your creativity.
landing.feature4.title: Multiple Formats
landing.feature4.desc: Vertical, horizontal, or square. Perfect for TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube.
landing.feature5.title: AI Creativity
landing.feature5.desc: Our models understand music and visuals to deliver artistic, emotionally engaging videos.
landing.feature6.title: HD Export
landing.feature6.desc: Download in Full HD without watermarks. Share directly to your platforms.
landing.ready.title: Ready to transform your music?
landing.ready.subtitle: Join thousands of artists creating stunning videos with AI.
